name: I Felt Your Presents
description:
All the elfs have left and it's up to Santa to check all the presents in the warehouse.

Green Items are Good and need to be Grabbed, Red is bad and needs to be left.

Controls

Space / Fire Button / Left Mouse Button - Grab

M - Toggle Music On/Off

F12 - Take Screenshot

Tip

If you miss a Green Item, you will lose points.

Credits

Code: Sikosis

Graphics: Synty Studios

Music: 

J. Arthur Keenes - The Day Before Boxing Day Eve

fluidvolt - O Come, O Come, Emmanuel

noisewaves - Last Xmas
